mapper.select: select a.id,a.role_id roleId,a.department_id departmentId, a.real_name realName,a.avatar,a.email,a.enable, a.mobile_phone mobilePhone,a.qq,a.username, d.name as `departmentName`,r.role from admin a LEFT join department d on a.department_id=d.id LEFT JOIN admin_role r on a.role_id=r.id WHERE a.id=#{id}
